message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.ST, cs.SY 

The paper discusses a method for solving bandit problems, which is a common topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The use of Thompson sampling and the online bootstrap are also techniques commonly used in these fields. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), cs.ST (Statistics), and cs.SY (Systems and Control).
